TEXT.TITLE: PEOPLES HERITAGE <PHBK> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Peoples Heritage Bank said it has agreed to purchase Northeast Leasing Co Inc, a Portland, Maine lessor of office equipment, for about 43,000 common shares. It said Norhteast had year-end receivables of 2,700,000 dlrs. Reuter
